channel.title: Please help me :)
channel.description:
hello guys :) i have a question: i downloaded a source + client i did everything good (trust me) but people cant log in (i have MODEM)
please help? ----- with tanks :)

item.title: Please help me :)
item.dc:creator: @FrozenLord FrozenLord
item.description:
@FrozenLord wrote:

i know all of it.
i changed 127.0.0.1 to my ip
but people still cant log in
how i open port on modem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 06:13:50 am[/size][hr]sorry for double but it on page 4 and i didnt solve my problem so please help me? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 06:14:47 am[/size][hr]sorry on double but its on page 4 and i didnt solve mt problem
please help me?

item.title: Please help me :)
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

check your clients GUI, and look for 127.0.0.1 and change it to whatever your IP is because you might be connecting from localhost

item.title: Please help me :)
item.dc:creator: @FrozenLord FrozenLord
item.description:
@FrozenLord wrote:

how i portforwarding in modem?

127.0.0.1 = just i can log in
i can log in to my own server,just other people dont.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me :)
item.dc:creator: @PKingKingScape PKingKingScape
item.description:
@PKingKingScape wrote:

Well, techinicaly to let other people play your server, you need to portforward, but you shouldnt need to just to look at it yourself.
2 things you can do:

  1. Run server and run moparclient and put 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 or ‘localhost’ as the IP
  2. Change all IP’s (server and client) to 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0 or ‘localhost’ and run.

Read full topic

Check the IPs you have put in the server and the client.
